#summary This page guides about how to update the header and footer information which is being stored in the Configuration List.
http://free-sharepoint-small-business-website-template-theme.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/Images/administrators.png

= What is Configuration List =

Configuration List is a list that is storing the following content of the site in the form of HTML containing tokens that are dynamically replaced when user action takes place.
  # Header information about contact details
  # Footer information
  # Admin Email content and subject
  # Self Email content and subject

= Update Header Content =

We are fetching the header and footer content from the configuration list itself.
